modVersion.name: Version
modVersion.hint: Currently installed module version (can't be changed here).

debug.name: Debug mode
debug.hint: Client-side setting enabling extended debug logging.

partyTokenNames1.name: Group #1 - List of members
partyTokenNames1.hint: Names of all tokens belonging to Group #1 (comma-separated).

groupTokenName1.name: Group #1 - Group name
groupTokenName1.hint: Name of the shared tokens of Group #1.

partyTokenNames2.name: Group #2 - List of members
partyTokenNames2.hint: Names of all tokens belonging to Group #2 (comma-separated).

groupTokenName2.name: Group #2 - Group name
groupTokenName2.hint: Name of the shared tokens of Group #2.

partyTokenNames3.name: Group #3 - List of members
partyTokenNames3.hint: Names of all tokens belonging to Group #3 (comma-separated).

groupTokenName3.name: Group #3 - Group name
groupTokenName3.hint: Name of the shared tokens of Group #2.

hideChatInfo.name: Hide module info in chat window
hideChatInfo.hint: Hides the info text about this module in the chat window on game start (deactivate this option to see it again).

chatInfoContent.title: Crunch My Party!
chatInfoContent.text3: Please refer to the various module preferences under game settings. Find even more details on GitHub
chatInfoContent.footer: This chat card will only be shown once. Activate once more in the module settings if needed.
